extension.name: mfile
extension.caption: File
extension.author: Lee Cher Yeong
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: File field type accept any type of file uploads. You can choose to limit the acceptable file extension in the parameter settings.

field.name: fileExtensions
field.label: Acceptable file extensions
field.description: Enter the acceptable file type of extension for this field. If you have more than one extension, please seperate the extension with a bar '|'. Example: 'gif|png|jpg|jpeg' or 'pdf', without quotes. Please do not start or end the value with a bar.

field.name: maxSize
field.label: Maximum Size (in bytes)
field.description: The maximum size for a file upload in bytes. Default is 10MB (10485760 bytes). Enter 0 for no limit. Note that your server may have a maximum upload limit.

field.name: useImage
field.label: Image
field.description: Enter the URL to the image you would like to use to link to the uploaded file. You can use {live_site} as the replacement for the value of site's domain. ie: {live_site}/images/save_f2.png

field.name: showText
field.label: Text
field.description: Enter the text for the download button.

field.name: showFilename
field.label: Show Filename
field.description: This allows you to hide the filename link.

field.name: linkClassSuffix
field.label: Link Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the download link.
